description: This file defines a repository interface for 'Template' entities in a Spring Data JPA-based Java project, enabling CRUD operations and a custom finder method.

classes.name: TemplateRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data repository interface for Template entity, providing standard CRUD methods and a custom 'findByPartner' method.

methods.name: findByPartner
methods.description: Retrieves a list of Template entities associated with a specific Partner.
